statements: SELECT * FROM patents;
SELECT id, product_name, patent_owner FROM patents WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, filing_date FROM patents WHERE patent_owner = 'Apple Inc.';
SELECT id, patent_number FROM patents WHERE filing_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM patents ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patents WHERE filing_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT product_name, patent_owner FROM patents WHERE expiration_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT id, patent_number, product_name FROM patents WHERE filing_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM patents WHERE patent_owner LIKE '%Technology%' AND expiration_date > '2023-06-30';
SELECT id, patent_number, filing_date FROM patents WHERE product_name = 'Software' ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patents;
SELECT patent_title, patent_description FROM patents WHERE patent_owner = 'Google';
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM products WHERE patent_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM patents ORDER BY patent_title DESC;
SELECT patent_owner, COUNT(*) AS total_patents FROM patents GROUP BY patent_owner;
SELECT * FROM patents WHERE patent_owner = 'Company A'
SELECT patent_title, patent_description FROM patents WHERE patent_id = 'c8e4d92d-19b8-47c5-b79c-7e3f7c4400d6'
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM products WHERE product_id = '2a345ea0-3408-4de7-afde-469b6bfc0df1'
SELECT * FROM patents JOIN products ON patents.patent_id = products.patent_id
SELECT patent_owner, product_name FROM patents JOIN products ON patents.patent_id = products.patent_id
SELECT * FROM patents;
SELECT title, filing_date FROM patents WHERE owner = 'Company A';
SELECT patent_id, description FROM patents WHERE filing_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT owner, COUNT(*) AS patent_count FROM patents GROUP BY owner;
SELECT product_name, category, launch_date FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM patents;
SELECT product_name, category, launch_date FROM products ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT patent_id, title, filing_date FROM patents WHERE filing_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT owner_name, headquarters_address FROM patent_owners WHERE phone_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT p.title, po.owner_name, pr.product_name FROM patents p JOIN patent_owners po ON p.owner = po.owner_id JOIN products pr ON p.patent_id = pr.patent_id ORDER BY p.title ASC, pr.product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM patents ORDER BY patent_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patent_title, patent_owner FROM patents WHERE product_category='Technology';
SELECT inventor_name, inventor_country FROM inventors WHERE inventor_country='USA' ORDER BY inventor_name ASC;
SELECT company_name, company_location FROM companies WHERE company_location='California';
SELECT * FROM patent_ownerships ORDER BY percentage_owned DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM patents ORDER BY patent_title DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT patent_title, product_name, patent_date FROM patents WHERE patent_owner = 'Apple Inc.'
SELECT inventor_name, inventor_country FROM inventors WHERE inventor_country = 'USA' AND inventor_name LIKE '%Smith%'
SELECT company_name, company_location FROM companies ORDER BY company_name ASC
SELECT * FROM patents WHERE product_category IN ('Electronics', 'Software')
SELECT * FROM biopharmaceutical_products;
SELECT patent_title, filing_date FROM patents;
SELECT inventor_name, patent_description FROM patents WHERE filing_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT owner_name, owner_country FROM patent_owners ORDER BY owner_name DESC;
SELECT patent_title, inventor_name FROM patents WHERE patent_id = 3;
SELECT patent_title, inventor_name FROM patents WHERE filing_date > '2020-01-01'
SELECT * FROM biopharmaceutical_products WHERE product_name LIKE '%medicine%'
SELECT owner_name, owner_country FROM patent_owners ORDER BY owner_name ASC
SELECT patent_title, inventor_name, filing_date FROM patents WHERE filing_date < '2019-01-01' ORDER BY filing_date DESC
SELECT * FROM patent_assignees WHERE assignment_date BETWEEN '2018-01-01' AND '2020-12-31'
